name: Magicarat Radiant
storyline: Second year student Hiroaki at the Arihara Gakuen meets two girls on a summer day. These two grils tell him, that they're magicians and with this event his normal life descends into chaos.
summary: Second year student Hiroaki at the Arihara Gakuen meets two girls on a summer day. These two grils tell him, that they're magicians and with this event his normal life descends into chaos.
